title: Mikan in the Kotatsu
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>Nom nom...... Mmm~! Yummy~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Mikan are always more delicious when you eat them in a kotatsu.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Yeah! The kotatsu just makes you want to chow down on them~ I’m gonna have another one right now! 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Oh, then I’ll have one too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Okay~ Here you go, Nozomi-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Ah, you peeled it for me. Thanks, Chika-chi.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Ehehe~ 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Why don’t I peel one for you too?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>......Whoa, you’re pretty good, Nozomi-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>I’m trying to use your technique! 𝅘𝅥𝅮 Here you go. 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
